imdb.title: Birdie Wing: Golf Girls' Story
imdb.plot: Eve and Aoi Amawashi, two golfers who come from completely different backgrounds, and have the completely opposite play styles, will shake the world of golf.

episodes.title: Rainbow Bullet
episodes.plot: Eve lives in a slum dwelling in Nafres and earns money from underground golf tournaments to help her friends. She has unique abilities that allow her to have powerful golf strikes. One day, she meets Aoi Amawashi from Japan and is blown away, a moment that changes her life forever.

episodes.title: Innocent Tyrant
episodes.plot: Eve and Aoi begin a golf match against each other.

episodes.title: A Match Between Just the Two of Us
episodes.plot: Thanks to an agreement with Catherine, Eve is able to fulfill a promise she made with Aoi. In the meantime, Aoi looks forward to their game, but other forces are at play.

episodes.title: Vipère
episodes.plot: Aoi's return to Japan is approaching fast. She and Eve agree to play a game early in the morning together. However, this is complicated when Eve is drawn into a scheme to repay the debt for her U15 Women's World Championship participation. She faces off with Vipère, a golfer backed by Mafia boss Nicholas.

episodes.title: VR
episodes.plot: Aoi can't get Eve out of her mind, while Eve's underground golf games are stalling in the aftermath of missing her game with Aoi. This all changes when she learns about a virtual reality golf game from Klein that many Japanese people play.

episodes.title: Rebellion's Cry
episodes.plot: The plan to redevelop the slums is going forward, with the impending destruction of Eve's home, which was caused by the betting schemes of Catherine. Catherine wants to hire Eve as her exclusive golfer for underground games, which Eve considers since it would be easier to raise money.

episodes.title: Purple (Aoi) Bullet
episodes.plot: Eve faces off against Rose in a golf match for the future of her friends and their home.

episodes.title: Final Bullet
episodes.plot: Eve wins her match against Rose and saves her friends at the last second. With the money they have, they stay at a hotel, then are helped by Vipère who gets them ID cards.

episodes.title: Ichina Saotome Wants to Be a Pro Caddy!
episodes.plot: Eve arrives at a golf course near Raiou Academy where meets aspiring pro caddy Ichina Saotome. While there, she reunites with Aoi, who is overjoyed to see her.

episodes.title: Evangeline is Frightfully Upset
episodes.plot: Eve is frustrated because she can't play a golf game with Aoi. Aoi declares that she needs Eve to improve her golf skills. Eve later plays a game against fellow golfers Kuyou Iseshiba and Kaoruko Iijima.

episodes.title: No Matter How Tall a Weed Grows, It Will Never Reach the Sun
episodes.plot: Golf Captain Jinguji takes Eve off for a training session in order to prepare her for the upcoming All-Japan Girls High School Doubles Championship.

episodes.title: Are Aoi and Eve okay together? The Doubles Championship Begins
episodes.plot: The Qualifying Tournaments for the All-Japan Girls High School Doubles Championships have begun and Eve and Aoi are poised to make a statement to the rest of their competitors that they are ready to battle.

episodes.title: I Think Who Gets What Room Is Very Important For Girls
episodes.plot:
